name: Banti Album Proofing
author: Banti Album Proofing

sections.description:
Used by professionals who appreciate good design and ease of use, Banti is an online album proofing solution for wedding and portrait photographers that makes album proofing easier than ever before. This plugin allows you to use and manage your client’s albums without ever leaving WordPress. A Banti Album Proofing account is required to use this plugin. You can get started at www.bantialbumproofing.com/register

No matter what software you use to design albums, you can use Banti to proof them.
sections.installation:
1. Upload banti-album-proofing directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload banti-album-proofing directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Do I have to have an account with Bantialbumproofing.com to use the plugin

Yes. If you don’t have an account the plugin will guide you through a process of creating one.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

Release Date – 11th January, 2015
* Minor bug fixes
* Updated to work with the latest release of Banti Album Proofing

1.0.1

  • First Release
